Rich influencers are getting paid to make videos showcasing the growth of Indian Railways under Narendra Modi in empty Vande Bharat trains. 

Meanwhile, common Indians are traveling like cattle in the sleeper coaches of Indian trains, still considering themselves fortunate to not

Imagine you are traveling in a Sleeper coach of Indian Railways with your family.

You have reserved your seat in advance or by paying hefty tatkal charges.
